contentrichtext.text: {{Navbox | name = Paralympic Games | title = [[Paralympic Games]] | image = [[File:IPC logo (2004).svg|100px]] | bodyclass = hlist | titlestyle = background: #BFD7FF | groupstyle = text-align:center; background: #BFD7FF | abovestyle = background: #BFD7FF | belowstyle = background: #BFD7FF | state = {{{state|autocollapse}}} | above = * ''[[International Paralympic Committee|IPC]]'' * ''[[Paralympic sports|Sports]]'' * ''[[All-time Paralympic Games medal table|Medal tables]]'' * ''[[List of IOC country codes|NPCs]]'' * ''[[Lists of Paralympic medalists|Medalists]]'' * ''[[Paralympic symbols|Symbols]]'' | group1 = '''[[Summer Paralympic Games|Summer Games]]''' | list1 = * [[1960 Summer Paralympics|1960]] * [[1964 Summer Paralympics|1964]] * [[1968 Summer Paralympics|1968]] * [[1972 Summer Paralympics|1972]] * [[1976 Summer Paralympics|1976]] * [[1980 Summer Paralympics|1980]] * [[1984 Summer Paralympics|1984]] * [[1988 Summer Paralympics|1988]] * [[1992 Summer Paralympics|1992]] * [[1996 Summer Paralympics|1996]] * [[2000 Summer Paralympics|2000]] * [[2004 Summer Paralympics|2004]] * [[2008 Summer Paralympics|2008]] * [[2012 Summer Paralympics|2012]] * ''[[2016 Summer Paralympics|2016]]'' | group2 = '''[[Winter Paralympic Games|Winter Games]]''' | list2 = * [[1976 Winter Paralympics|1976]] * [[1980 Winter Paralympics|1980]] * [[1984 Winter Paralympics|1984]] * [[1988 Winter Paralympics|1988]] * [[1992 Winter Paralympics|1992]] * [[1994 Winter Paralympics|1994]] * [[1998 Winter Paralympics|1998]] * [[2002 Winter Paralympics|2002]] * [[2006 Winter Paralympics|2006]] * [[2010 Winter Paralympics|2010]] * ''[[2014 Winter Paralympics|2014]]'' * ''[[2018 Winter Paralympics|2018]]'' | below = * Recent and upcoming Games: [[2008 Summer Paralympics|Beijing 2008]] * [[2010 Winter Paralympics|Vancouver 2010]] * [[2012 Summer Paralympics|London 2012]] * ''[[2014 Winter Paralympics|Sochi 2014]]'' * ''[[2016 Summer Paralympics|Rio de Janeiro 2016]]'' }}<noinclude> {{collapsible option}} [[Category:Paralympics navigational boxes]] </noinclude>
